headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ELKIND, VAN GELDER, MARGARET

lead_paragraph: ELKIND-VAN GELDER--Margaret, died of cancer on January 30, 2014 at the age of 52. Beloved wife of Todd Van Gelder, adoring mother to Eric and Will Van Gelder and loving sister to Elisabeth and Sam Elkind, she was predeceased by her parents, Charlotte and Morton Digby Elkind. Born in Brooklyn, NY, she attended Packer, Spence, Wesleyan and Bank Street and had various jobs in the education field before moving to Brookeville, MD where her primary focus was her family and her many friends from every stage of her life. Memorial: Saturday, February 15th at noon, The Inn at Brookeville Farms, 19501 Georgia Ave., Brookeville, MD.
